ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Rod of Insidious Glamour
ygData.msgSnippet: As far as I know, you can get them off of any Shadowed Men.  I was able to get mine off of one in Lesser Fay.  The only drawback that I found was that it took
ygData.messageBody:
As far as I know, you can get them off of any Shadowed Men. I was able to get
mine off of one in Lesser Fay. The only drawback that I found was that it took
FOREVER for one to drop.

Best of luck =)

Horchata Sabrosa
<Art of War>
Brell
